column4: who can help me? when I open a gnome-term on desktop, it will turn to gray, and the tool bar on desktop don't refresh,then my full desktop don't refresh
but if I log in desktop by root , that's all ok.
how can you login as root?
what have you done to enable root account?
why have you enabled root account?
I forgot it. give me a minutes
I'm afraid it might be that in order to resolve your problem, it might be necessary (or easiest) to reinstall the whole system. I'd like to know though, why you've enabled root account?
ok, then, can you tell us what you did before your account became unusable?
no ... I don't know what happend in my machine
did you install something? did you use Ultamatix or something?
It just turn to gray all my program
